display_long_description:
**DESTROY** cities with your giant hands! BURN buildings! TOSS tanks! EAT people! Block Buster is dedicated to every Kaiju movie you’ve ever watched. YOU are the monster in this action-packed arcade experience.   

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75203616_975930037306424_8836480533183663854_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ebJ3Wb9kMAUQ7kNvgFqGkE6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agn--QHy13jRDhQT-FsvRty&oh=00_AYAGWWKcoaGP1q7Id7lodlc2rc3bRq-BDCJsmFfyjbA_1g&oe=6708CD73)

Tear it up with **FIVE PLAYABLE MONSTERS**: a giant APE, a radioactive LIZARD, a massive MECHA, an angry PRAWN…or…a…badass BUTTERFLY…? Just go with it.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75476753_381600718231449_6580200408874214105_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=rGFWTyTuPlUQ7kNvgHiHAUP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agn--QHy13jRDhQT-FsvRty&oh=00_AYAL44pPb-hQ-KM1TxwAd0Oplm3rxL2RWV7SZo64EkN4tA&oe=6708C90E)

**RAMPAGE** through destruction-based scavenger hunts in **FIVE UNIQUE CITIES**, battling bosses and unlocking hidden paths.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982671_383789781374477_7752603973585416388_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=RePahWM9DIwQ7kNvgFf8c7t&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agn--QHy13jRDhQT-FsvRty&oh=00_AYC-AmvDznZ4vtRyEHnIeXPFdaxsrFAlf_8SZYrhGSc81w&oe=6708A9AD)

**CRUSH COMPETITION** in an all-new **MULTIPLAYER** mode: Monster Mash! Fight players and dodge thrown objects while stuffing your face full of people. Are you the king of the monsters?

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982511_1352459736143696_1605943770822917015_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=oJ8o3cYrB8sQ7kNvgHTKlk0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agn--QHy13jRDhQT-FsvRty&oh=00_AYCSmUqS4jccEAdvilgG0i_PwMhj-fWT46aR2ePtZI9Fuw&oe=67089ED1)

Kaiju-Casual in **CO-OP FREE PLAY!** Mess around with buddies, hone your Kaiju skills, customize settings...heck, record your own monster movie and share it with us!

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75262741_746862634045725_5615460230622982910_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=IsyuFnvZDiYQ7kNvgEcID7T&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agn--QHy13jRDhQT-FsvRty&oh=00_AYBCfnvB1L_Ac9_WL0QUTSOn4F232NtBp59TtYPPWXoSzg&oe=6708CA51)

Done smashing? Build **CUSTOM COSPLAY BEASTS** in your ultimate Kaiju **FAN LAIR**. Curate the ultimate **MONSTER MOVIE COLLECTION** within the Block Buster universe!

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982572_1121349405591408_2928923264553630951_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=es_iPocmw60Q7kNvgEAFy28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agn--QHy13jRDhQT-FsvRty&oh=00_AYACNs84tawyuTFteC0LEFAOGDNVFAppV94NO1Yy9m-k1g&oe=6708B6B7)

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974670_2746558425521081_2484431116756024503_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=aixtMNPmoN8Q7kNvgE00oXw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Agn--QHy13jRDhQT-FsvRty&oh=00_AYAdXQx5R_20ffbgZfGs5JfhvE12_9IshAPgViwXe3WWBw&oe=6708B593)

**You like bullet points?! So do we:**

- An engaging single player experience!

- 2 All-New multiplayer game modes!

- Hidden items and secret paths in each city!

- Uncover the mysteries behind the kaiju attacks!

- Fun "monster sized" weapons to unlock!

- Global leaderboards and 26 Meta Achievements!

- Over 300 collectible items to display!

- Avatar and monster customization!

- Gameplay options for monsters of all sizes!

- Awesome soundtrack by 8-bit Weapon and ComputeHer!

- BULLET POINTS!!!
